bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wu jue si 五絕死 , the five cut-offs with [an appearance of] death. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 夫五絕者：一曰自縊 , 二曰牆壁壓迮 , 三曰溺水 , 四曰魘寐 , 五曰產乳絕 , “Now, the five cut-offs include, first, [appearance of death following] suicide by hanging; second, [appearance of death following] being crushed by a wall; third, [appearance of death because of] drowning; fourth, [appearance of death because of] nightmare demons; fifth, [appearance of death in the course of giving] birth”.
